knimeNode.name: XLS Sheet Selector
knimeNode.shortDescription: The XLS Sheet Selector node specifies the target XLS sheet for further XLS formatting instructions.

fullDescription.intro:
The XLS Sheet Selector node specifies the target XLS sheet for further XLS formatting instructions.
Further downstream XLS Formatting nodes then define the formatting instructions for this sheet. These can finally be written to a xlsx file for all sheets at once via the XLS Formatter (apply) node.
fullDescription.option: If deactivated, the first sheet is used instead (as if this node would be omitted).
The name of the XLS sheet that you want further instructions to be applied on.

ports.outPort: The XLS Formatter output port as collector for downstream formatting instructions for this sheet.
